description:
Nobunaga returns to Gifu Castle and plans his next attack, and the Miyoshi Three start to make a move in the west. Chidori and Sukezo head to Mori Yoshinari’s house on an errand. When they arrive, Mori’s older son challenges her to a duel.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Just a Little Trip to the Mori Clan
Petit tour chez le clan Mori
